# SEQ11 Instructions

## Description
Sequence 11 focuses on public open land

## Category
Towns

## Patterns
apl058, apl059, apl060, apl061, apl062, apl063, apl064

## Emergent Phenomena
Public spaces that provide access to nature and opportunities for recreation and gathering

## Overview
This sequence contains 7 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
